paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the Val30Met variant of the TTR gene in the context of hereditary ATTR amyloidosis, detailing its structural implications and clinical significance.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Both patients show polyneuropathy with cardiac involvement.
Both patients show polyneuropathy with cardiac involvement.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met variant leads to the formation of type A amyloid fibrils.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the two patients described.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the structural implications of the Val30Met variant in TTR and its association with amyloid fibril formation.
key_quotes: Well over 120 mutational variants of TTR are known to give rise to hereditary ATTR amyloidosis with Val30Met being a particularly important one.
Both patients show polyneuropathy with cardiac involvement.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR variant was extracted from the main text.
